description: Single storey rear/side extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension; installation three rooflights to front roofslope and a window within side gable wall
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s):

Proposed Front and Side Elevation drawing no.02 Rev A, Proposed Front and Side Elevation drawing no.03 Rev A, Proposed First Floor Plans drawing no.05 Rev A, Proposed Second Floor Plans drawing no.06 Rev A, Proposed Section Plan drawing no.07 Rev A and Proposed Block Plan drawing no.08
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and the Ealing Local Plan (Reg 19) policy DAA.
